topics.body: So I was playing Fallout 2 and I accidentally wiped out a town.

topics.body:

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dfe9a46368727df5c70500#post_54dfe9a46368727df5c70500

Was it the Den? I accidentally killed everyone there once or twice. I know there's a couple towns where things just go to shit really hard if you fuck up.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
Happy Valentine's Day.
Just kidding, it was yesterday for me.

Also, I hate how my "friends" at Facebook keep posting religious bullshit all over their page. There is always at least one person everyday trying to start a controversy, hate or why-this-is-wrong trope.

It just makes my Facebook life terrible.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dfeb726368727e08681300#post_54dfeb726368727e08681300
Eveyone should wipe out a town some day.
Little Pip did it too.

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dfebc563687260a23e0200#post_54dfebc563687260a23e0200
Imagine if *ALL* the characters considered Ultimate Lifeforms would be just one!

Like, a fusion of every Ultimate Lifeform!
